settings.markdownTextFunction: return '# Some title\n - Entity name: ' + data[0]['entityName'];
settings.markdownTextPattern: Parameter | Value -------- | ----- Energy-meter ID | ${entityName} Location Name | ${entityLabel} Last Activity Time | ${lastActivityTime} Energy-meter Brand | __${sinvBrand}__ Energy-meter Model | ${sinvModel} Communication Error | ${comError} Reverse Power | ${reversePower} Bad Data | ${badData} Is Consuming | ${isConsuming} 3 Phase Unbalanced Load | ${em3PhUnbalancedLoad}

settings.markdownTextFunction: return '# Some title\n - Entity name: ' + data[0]['entityName'];
settings.markdownTextPattern: Parameter | Value -------- | ----- Voltage A-N | ${voltage_an} V Voltage B-N | ${voltage_bn} V Voltage C-N | ${voltage_cn} V Voltage L-N Avg | ${avg_voltage_ln} V Parameter | Value -------- | ----- Voltage A-B | ${voltage_ab} V Voltage B-C | ${voltage_bc} V Voltage C-A | ${voltage_ca} V Voltage L-L Avg | ${avg_voltage_ll} V Parameter | Value -------- | ----- Current A | ${current_a} A Current B | ${current_b} A Current C | ${current_c} A Current Avg | ${avg_current} A

settings.markdownTextFunction: return '# Some title\n - Entity name: ' + data[0]['entityName'];
settings.markdownTextPattern: Parameter | Value -------- | ----- Active Power Total | ${total_active_power_kw} kW Reactive Power Total | ${total_reactive_power_kvar} kVAR Apparent Power Total | ${total_apparent_power_kva} kVA Parameter | Value -------- | ----- Frequency | ${frequency} Hz Power Factor Total | ${powerFactor} Total Net Active Energy | ${totalEnergy} kWh

settings.markdownTextFunction: return '# Some title\n - Entity name: ' + data[0]['entityName'];
settings.markdownTextPattern: Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_1 | ${DCVoltageInput_1} V DCCurrentInput_1 | ${DCCurrentInput_1} A DCPowerInput_1 | ${DCPowerInput_1} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_2 | ${DCVoltageInput_2} V DCCurrentInput_2 | ${DCCurrentInput_2} A DCPowerInput_2 | ${DCPowerInput_2} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_3 | ${DCVoltageInput_3} V DCCurrentInput_3 | ${DCCurrentInput_3} A DCPowerInput_3 | ${DCPowerInput_3} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_4 | ${DCVoltageInput_4} V DCCurrentInput_4 | ${DCCurrentInput_4} A DCPowerInput_4 | ${DCPowerInput_4} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_5 | ${DCVoltageInput_5} V DCCurrentInput_5 | ${DCCurrentInput_5} A DCPowerInput_5 | ${DCPowerInput_5} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_6 | ${DCVoltageInput_6} V DCCurrentInput_6 | ${DCCurrentInput_6} A DCPowerInput_6 | ${DCPowerInput_6} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_7 | ${DCVoltageInput_7} V DCCurrentInput_7 | ${DCCurrentInput_7} A DCPowerInput_7 | ${DCPowerInput_7} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_8 | ${DCVoltageInput_8} V DCCurrentInput_8 | ${DCCurrentInput_8} A DCPowerInput_8 | ${DCPowerInput_8} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_9 | ${DCVoltageInput_9} V DCCurrentInput_9 | ${DCCurrentInput_9} A DCPowerInput_9 | ${DCPowerInput_9} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_10 | ${DCVoltageInput_10} V DCCurrentInput_10 | ${DCCurrentInput_10} A DCPowerInput_10 | ${DCPowerInput_10} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_11 | ${DCVoltageInput_11} V DCCurrentInput_11 | ${DCCurrentInput_11} A DCPowerInput_11 | ${DCPowerInput_11} kW Parameter | Value -------- | ----- DCVoltageInput_12 | ${DCVoltageInput_12} V DCCurrentInput_12 | ${DCCurrentInput_12} A DCPowerInput_12 | ${DCPowerInput_12} kW
